text:
Many Republicans have called the Bipartisan Infrastructure program “socialist.” Then, they asked for money from it.

You can’t make this stuff up. https://t.co/yQVHlM3vYw

name: JoeBiden
text: Last year, a family of four saved an average of $2,400 through the American Rescue Plan I signed into law. And now, the Inflation Reduction Act locks in place those lower health care premiums for millions of families who get their coverage through the Affordable Care Act.

name: JoeBiden
text: The United States must lead the world in producing semiconductor chips, and the CHIPs and Science Act is going to make sure that it will.

name: JoeBiden
text:
Extreme MAGA Republican Senator Ron Johnson wants to put Social Security and Medicare on the chopping block every year.

This guy never gives up. 

But we never give up either.

name: JoeBiden
text:
Sending people to prison for possessing marijuana has upended too many lives and incarcerated people for conduct that many states no longer prohibit. That's before you address the clear racial disparities around prosecution and conviction. 

Today, we start to right these wrongs.

name: JoeBiden
text:
The CHIPs and Science Act makes historic investments in companies to build advanced manufacturing facilities here in America. 

Now IBM is investing $20 billion to design and manufacture semiconductors, mainframe technology, and quantum computers.

name: JoeBiden
text:
Too many lives have been upended because of our failed approach to marijuana.

Today I announced a pardon of all prior federal offenses of simple possession of marijuana, urged governors to do the same, and asked HHS and DOJ to review how marijuana is scheduled under federal law.

name: JoeBiden
text:
The world is changing. We can either shape it, or we can be shaped by it. I believe we have an enormous opportunity to build back a country that is even better than before.

Can I count on you to join us? https://t.co/V9Mzpw8kB0

name: JoeBiden
text: Congressional Republicans are doubling down on their extreme position with a proposal for a national abortion ban. That means even if you live in a state where extremist Republican officials are not running the show, your right to choose will still be at risk.

name: JoeBiden
text:
I wish I could say Republicans supported our progress in reducing health care costs and strengthening Medicare. That would be good for all of America.
 
But when it actually came time to do something about inflation around the kitchen table, every one of them voted no.

name: JoeBiden
text:
Congress should codify the protections of Roe v. Wade and do it once and for all. 

But right now, we're short a handful of votes, so the only way it's going to happen is if the American people vote in November.

name: JoeBiden
text: I signed the Bipartisan Safer Communities Act into law, the first major gun safety legislation in nearly 30 years. I’m not going to stop until I again get an assault weapons ban passed.

name: JoeBiden
text: MAGA Republicans don’t have a clue about the power of women. They are about to find out. https://t.co/akmHFkuOXS

name: JoeBiden
text:
We're not going to sit by and let Republicans throughout the country enact extreme policies to threaten access to basic health care.

That's why we have taken a number of actions to protect access to reproductive health care, including emergency medical care.

name: JoeBiden
text:
For years, there has been no check on how high or how fast Big Pharma can raise drug prices. But thanks to the Inflation Reduction Act, that ends now. 

If Big Pharma tries to raise drug prices faster than inflation, they'll be penalized and have to rebate the money to Medicare.

name: JoeBiden
text: If you’re on Medicare and you have diabetes, your insulin is going to be capped at $35 a month.

name: JoeBiden
text:
Senator Ron Johnson said if Republicans get control of Washington, they’re coming after the Affordable Care Act again, denying protections for anyone with a preexisting condition. 

These guys never stop.

name: JoeBiden
text: Get in, folks. We're building a better America: https://t.co/V9Mzpw8kB0 https://t.co/cMKiF0Lqwz

name: JoeBiden
text:
Today, I announced more than $60 million in funding to help coastal areas in Puerto Rico become better prepared for storms. 

In addition, nearly $700 million in infrastructure investments in Puerto Rico have been announced since I signed the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law.

name: JoeBiden
text:
My dad used to say, “Joey, don’t compare me to the Almighty. Compare me to the alternative.”

And here’s the deal: Democrats want to codify Roe. Republicans want a national ban on abortion. The choice is clear.

name: JoeBiden
text:
Republicans are always talking about the deficit. Well, guess what? The last guy increased the debt with tax cuts for big corporations. Not a penny of it was paid for. 

This year, we've reduced the deficit by more than $1 trillion.

name: JoeBiden
text:
In the past 24 hours, we've approved four more counties in Florida for individual disaster assistance in addition to the nine counties we announced yesterday. 

The federal government will cover 100% of the cost to clear the massive debris left in the wake of the hurricane.

name: JoeBiden
text: My message to the people of Florida and to the country: At times like this, America comes together. We’re going to pull together as one team, as one America.

name: JoeBiden
text: In 42 days, democracy is on the ballot. Americans will have to choose between the MAGA Republican platform—embracing extremism and the Big Lie—and Democrats, independents, and mainstream Republicans who believe in the rule of law.

name: JoeBiden
text:
This morning, we got good news about lower costs. The Department of Health and Human Services announced that the premium for Medicare Part B will decrease next year. 

For years, that fee has gone up. Now, for the first time in more than a decade, it's going to go down.

name: JoeBiden
text:
There is so much on the line in these midterm elections. With just a few weeks to go, we need your help to protect and expand our Democratic majorities in Congress.

Can you chip in to help elect Democrats today?
https://t.co/QOggr7BzbZ

name: JoeBiden
text:
Democracy cannot survive when one side believes there’s only two outcomes to an election: either they win, or they were cheated.

That’s not democracy. And that’s where the vast majority of MAGA Republicans are today.  

You can’t love your country only when you win.

name: JoeBiden
text: This November, we have a choice to be a nation of hope, unity, and optimism, or a nation of fear, division, and darkness. https://t.co/zUkNiGUHZh

name: JoeBiden
text: The power to get this done is in the hands of the American people. https://t.co/dhdDg2GGbC

name: JoeBiden
text:
Senator Lindsey Graham has proposed a national ban on abortion that would put criminal penalties on doctors. 

This November, if Republicans win control, they will vote for a nationwide ban on abortion. But if you give me two more Democrats in the Senate, I will codify Roe.

name: JoeBiden
text: If Republicans control the Congress, Social Security will be on the chopping block. But if you support Democrats, I promise you: Social Security will be protected. Period.

name: JoeBiden
text:
It’s time to pass the assault weapons ban. I’ve taken on the NRA, and I beat them before.

I plan on doing it again. https://t.co/SkQOe0VnLS

name: JoeBiden
text:
The MAGA Republicans didn’t side with law enforcement; they sided with the insurrectionists. 

Don’t tell me you support law enforcement if you can’t condemn what happened on January 6. You can’t be pro-law enforcement and pro-insurrection.

name: JoeBiden
text:
When I came to office, the economy was flat on its back—millions out of work. 

So we acted quickly. We passed the American Rescue Plan, which lifted this nation from economic crisis to economic recovery. And every single Republican voted against it.

name: JoeBiden
text: We beat Big Pharma. Now, Medicare will have the power to do what so many Democrats and many Republicans in the past talked about doing: lowering prescription drug prices. https://t.co/sOMdwSuXKE

name: JoeBiden
text:
In February, I laid out our plan to supercharge the Cancer Moonshot that is bold, ambitious, and completely doable. 

The goal is to cut cancer death rates by at least 50% in the next 25 years and to create a more supportive experience for our patients and families.

name: JoeBiden
text:
Every single Republican in Congress voted against the Inflation Reduction Act.

When it came time to actually do something about inflation, Republicans said no.

name: JoeBiden
text:
If you give me two more Democratic senators, and Democrats keep the House, I promise you we will codify Roe v. Wade.

We will once again make Roe the law of the land.

We will once again protect a woman’s right to choose.

name: JoeBiden
text: At @NEAToday to highlight the choice voters have between building an economy that works for working families, and the Republican plan to make health care more expensive, ban abortion nationwide, and put Medicare and Social Security on the chopping block. https://t.co/eYxWRRsJFC

name: JoeBiden
text:
46 days. Let’s do this.
https://t.co/eyyg5n1xUJ

name: JoeBiden
text: We passed the most extensive gun legislation in 30 years and I'm not going to rest until we get assault weapons banned. Our kids should be learning how to read and write, not duck and cover. https://t.co/ZOiHY2PXnc

name: JoeBiden
text: To address the inequities in cancer treatment, the Cancer Moonshot allows us to ensure prevention, detection, and treatment reach patients in urban, rural, suburban, and Tribal communities, so they have equal access to cancer diagnostics, therapeutics, and clinical trials.

name: JoeBiden
text:
I’m heading to Florida to talk to voters about the issues at stake in the midterms. From protecting Social Security to women’s health—we have work to do. Join me for a grassroots rally on Tuesday, September 27. RSVP here:
https://t.co/ihDdikuzA9

name: JoeBiden
text: Last week, I signed an executive order that directs the federal government to ensure biotechnologies invented in the United States of America are made in the United States of America.

name: JoeBiden
text: Join us at https://t.co/V9MzpvQJcq to fight back against extreme MAGA Republicans. https://t.co/iiQs2AzzuS

name: JoeBiden
text:
Dark money erodes public trust. We need to protect public trust—and I'm determined to do that.

Republicans should join Democrats to pass the DISCLOSE Act and get it to my desk right away.

name: JoeBiden
text:
For our democracy to work, it is up to all of us to protect the right to vote—and exercise it. The first step that all of us can take is to make sure we are registered to vote. 

On National Voter Registration Day, go to https://t.co/Hy8C4mIL2M to check your registration status.

name: JoeBiden
text:
On National Voter Registration Day, @TheDemocrats are making sure everyone has the tools to talk to their community about the importance of voting. Learn how to take action with people across the country tomorrow at 7pm ET: 
https://t.co/yLUbBrwpMr
